storyInfo: Liskarm has the misfortune to go on a patrol mission with some of the most frivolous operators. She comes prepared and has everything planned out, though it appears her teammates have their own plans too.

attributes.content: An apple party...?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Exactly! I looked it up with Utage and Click. There's a wild apple forest not too far away from here right in season. There's so many apples there, we'd have enough to keep the party going for three whole days!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: And it'll cost us nothing!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: That sounds great. Be sure to invite me.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Oh! W-Wait up!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Well, we're 100% certain we'll, ahem, just happen to walk by that apple forest on our next mission. There's one little problem though... The mission's captain...
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: It's *her*.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Oh, I see. If she's in charge, then I guess she's going to do everything by the book.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: That's why we came to you for help. We're not sure how to break the ice with her...
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: How about you give her some of those apples? But, well, it's true she's not the type of leader to just let her team members wander off.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Rhodes Island is heading through a pretty safe area right now, but there are still many hidden dangers out there.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: So... What do you think of our plan?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: It sounds a little difficult to pull off, but... I think it's good! And if the apple party gives you a chance to hit it off with her, that's two beasts with one stroke.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Let me give you a few suggestions. Hmm... For example...
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Here's a hot tip I'll let you in on. She actually really likes it when people kick up a fuss about her.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Hm? That sounds so sketchy...
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: It's 100% real, you have my word. Secondly, do not finish reading her mission handbook.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: That's also kinda...
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: And thirdly—
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Uh, what was the third one... Oh, right.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: As long you don't hear any sparky sounds around her, just pick on her as much as you want!
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Um, hold on, that's probably a little too gutsy, even for us...
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Jeez, why would I lie to you? And here I was trying to help you guys out.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Haha... I trust you. I just don't know if we're ballsy enough to buy into that whole idea.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Hehe, no worries. If she starts getting really mad and that scares you, you can tell her I told you guys to do that.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: She took all of my field ops even though I only got a few scratches... I'm counting on you to really teach her a lesson... I mean... to get along with her.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: I see! I get it now!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Ugh, I don't get it at all—
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Let's stop here for our orientation.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Okay!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: (Click, Utage, you two ready? The mission's a go!)
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: (Okay.)
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: To ensure our mission comes to a successful conclusion, I've already looked into the abilities, specialties, personalities, and combat styles of everyone on our patrol unit today and made the necessary arrangements...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Whoa—Check this out, Click! It's an apple tree!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Myrtle is excellent at boosting her teammates' morale and can also help provide medical assistance. When we perform reconnaissance in pairs, she also analyzes the situation well and provides good, reliable suggestions.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: A-Ahem.
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Let me take a look with my camera—
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Whoa, you're right! Nice! Who knew we would be so lucky today~!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: On the other hand, Click is very dependable in both support and record-keeping capacities. These are especially useful in patrol and recon missions.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I betcha these apple trees have been around for centuries. If we pick all the apples here, we can make so many tasty apple desserts, it'll last us three whole days!
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: We don't get this kinda chance every day!
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Utage is very agile. That makes her well-suited for recon in the frontlines.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: And Vanilla is dependably strong in actual combat...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Thanks, Captain!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: And actually, I... I'm pretty fond of apple desserts too.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: All of you... Listen. To. Me.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: S-Sorry!
attributes.name: Everyone

attributes.content: You girls should be ashamed of yourselves! How could you talk while the squad captain's speaking?
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Myrtle, how could you...!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: That's what you say, Myrtle, but I can so see it in your eyes. You're totes thinking about those haystacks all the way over there, the comfy sunshine, and the apple forest.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Yeah, what she said! If anyone's mind's not here, it's gotta be Myrtle!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: W-What? Now that's not nice, slandering your friend with wild guesses!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Hmph, I thought we could get through this mission without sticking to the rules so much... but your laziness is far beyond my expectations.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: She's right. If you girls worked at Blacksteel and the higher-ups found you slacking off like this, you wouldn't get away with just a bad performance evaluation.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Tsk, just hearing the word 'performance' is enough to kill my mood three times over...
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: You'll miss out on so many opportunities to just chill if you always try to be such a good girl, Vanilla. Gotta learn how to slack off whenever it's okay to.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Oh, yeah, why don't you join our 'Apple Patrol' group?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Huh? But the Blacksteel handbook doesn't let us...
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Think about it. Our job today is to patrol the area. You can just call it a kinda unexpected outcome of our little trip.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Yep, yep. I mean, that's a whole field of yummy apples waiting for us, all gratis!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Patrol and recon missions are not to be abused like that.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Mmm...
attributes.name: Click&Myrtle

attributes.content: Oh, come on, Captain Liskarm! Aside from Vanilla, none of us here have gone through any actual PMC training!
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: We just fight the way it feels right, that's all!
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: T-That's right...!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: I'm just here to get some simple missions under my belt...
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: And if I get to brag all about it to my parents and my brothers when Rhodes Island is stopped close to my hometown, that's good enough for me.
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: I thought I made it clear to you yesterday that you must review the mission handbook in its entirety. Now, I can still make this pleasant.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: So long as one of you answers what the operational time and commands listed in the handbook are correctly.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Ugh, but that mission plan was way too long!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: And like I said, this actually...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Of course we know we gotta stay alert and what we gotta look out for while we're out on patrol missions.
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: But I really agree with Myrtle here, Captain Liskarm. Your mission plan is just way... way too detailed!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: That's right. How do you expect us to keep up when you have our positions and actions during the patrol laid out down to the second?!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: We're humans, not machines that run on Originium!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Even those robots we have back at Rhodes Island have more personality than what you're asking for.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: I did all this for your own good—
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: We could find ourselves in all kinds of unexpected situations even on the simplest patrol missions. We could run into violent mutant Originium Slugs, the weather could suddenly take a turn for the worse, and we could even run into bandits.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Of course, I still have a backup plan. That said... hmph.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: All of you are severely lacking in actual combat experience. That worries me—
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: So... Captain Liskarm, you're trying to make things easier for us this way?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: I... I get it now! This is just the best way Captain Liskarm could come up with to make the information digestible, by turning it into study materials!
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: I knew I'd come across someone this serious one of these days, but well...
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: For lack of a better term, you're like an honor student with these habits of yours.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: What do you mean, 'honor student?'
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: With these habits, you are really quite the honor student.
Tsk...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: So, Liskarm, how come you're always such an honor student, so obsessed with carrying out your combat plans by the book?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: I think you'd be more interesting. Like, that ability of yours where you just shoot out electricity with a spark is so much cooler than anything I've ever seen.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: What makes you say that?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: It's just the vibe I'm getting from you, I guess.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: We've teamed up for three days now. I don't know how you feel about them, but I've had a lot of fun. There's so many great things about you that have piqued my interest.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: But it wasn't until we came to the field together today that I noticed this. You and I don't actually get along that well.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: What a coincidence. I feel the same way.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Franka, if I'm not mistaken, our superior, Dr. Janet Longfellow, should already have taught you to be rigorous and meticulous, and to always maintain a basic level of safety awareness as a Blacksteel employee.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Yeah, I'm sick of hearing all that.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: That's what you stubborn types always say: gotta stick to the rules and all that, but you guys never try to stand in my shoes either.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: I passed all of Blacksteel's operator evaluations fair and square, and I got As in almost all the categories, so that makes me half an honor student too, doesn't it?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: I've more than proven myself, but why are the higher-ups are so antsy about keeping me in check? They even went through all that HR nightmare just to have the two of us buddy up.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: You should've filed your grievances before the mission if you were going to complain.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I have no doubt you are more than capable. It's part of the basics to get a good grasp of your partner's abilities, after all.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Which is why I would appreciate it if you would understand that, based on the results of our evaluations alone, there is a 1% difference between you and me.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: See? You got a 1% difference because of how uptight you are.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: I mean, how uptight do you have to be to lay out your plans on the battlefield down to the second?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Let's just say I wanted to do the pointless work, then.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: However, know that I drew these conclusions by analyzing and simulating all the courses of action we could take, and I've also taken into account all unexpected situations we could find ourselves in.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Do you think my cautiousness is a bad thing?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I'm not saying it's a bad thing.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: It's a pain in the ass, though.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Both of us can access each other's files, Liskarm.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: And I know how you got your teammates hurt because there were problems with your command.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Are you sure those teammates didn't make those mistakes because they relied on that cautiousness of yours a little too much?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Likewise, your obsession with acting on your own and your lack of concern for your teammates' safety when you strayed into enemy territory were also recorded in the files.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Surely you haven't forgotten about that?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Hah.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: I hate to admit it, but we're both alive and kicking and right in front of each other. Don't you think it's funny that we're basing our image of each other on some silly rumors and data?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: That's why I would prefer it if you could at least try to understand the concerns of your fellow teammates.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: You need to understand just how haphazard it is to take on all the dangers yourself. I am sure you've already learned about this the hard way multiple times.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Are you worried about me?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Right... I suppose I am.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: For the time being, we are partners.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Partners, huh...?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: I think the longest that a duo has stuck together with each other at Blacksteel was only, what, four years?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: They change our posts often to make sure we get used to a wider variety of environments and circumstances.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Though Janet has also said that both you and I are too quirky, so it's hard for us to find suitable partners.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: And to prove that we'd work well together as a team, she said she'd give us enough time to get used to working with each other.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Considering how we've already wasted much of our time on this needless debate, I can already imagine how long it'll take before we tolerate each other.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: *Sigh*... It's only my first mission, but my evaluation will likely take a huge hit.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: My performance evaluation—
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Hehe... This isn't that bad either, is it?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: I mean, the way you do all your homework beforehand is kinda extreme, but it's not a bad thing to take precautions.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: If you can manage to predict even some of my so-called out-of-line actions, that might actually be a huge improvement to both of us.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: We'll see if you're worth the extra effort, then.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Likewise, Franka, it's true that I wasn't able to prevent my teammates from getting injured with my calculations.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I admit I still have a long way to go.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Keeping your sense of responsibility in check is a means to keep a cooler head.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Oh, don't worry. If we really do hit it off with each other, I could help poke holes in those mission plans of yours in actual combat.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Feel free to keep bluffing.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Do show me how you would relieve yourself of your sense of responsibility and keep your cool during combat.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Heh, well don't you blink for even a moment then.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: *Cough*... *cough*. Are you okay, Liskarm?!
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: I-I'm okay...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Well, I didn't expect you to actually have a few more tricks up your sleeve.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: What's this now? Some kind of last-gasp attack bordering on cutting your tail off?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: This is nothing as scary as that... *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: This is just... a last-ditch effort... to clean up your mess.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I'm pretty sure I am the one cleaning somebody's mess here.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: And here I thought you had the battlefield so under control, you had everything figured out down to the second, but looks like you're just another dummy who can't keep herself from electrocuting everything when things get hairy.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: You could at least stop mocking me when I'm so exhausted.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Either bring me back so I can get some rest there, or just leave me alone and give me some peace and quiet...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: What's the matter, Franka...?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Hey, Franka? Are you taking me with you or not?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: You're leaving me behind in a battlefield?!
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Hm, I thought you couldn't move even a bit?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Of course I can. Do you really think that much could wear me out?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Hmph... Well, in that case, I guess I can torment you however I want?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Wait, what are you doing...? Don't touch my hair!
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I'm definitely going to talk to Dr. Longfellow tomorrow. I'll tell her all about this and have her call off this dreaded team-up—
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Yeah, I'd like to see you try.
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: Need I remind you just how much Janet loves me?
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: (*Sigh*, why do I remember all this down to the details?)
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Liskarm, are you mad?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: I'm sorry. I'll try to get them to calm down too.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Don't worry. I get it too. This is just a normal patrol and recon mission.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: W-We aren't trying to give you a hard time, Captain Liskarm. Sorry...
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: I mean, all of us really respect how Blacksteel does things. How strict they are, how they emphasize safety and whatnot, but that's just out of our reach...
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: I've actually finished reading that guidebook, you know! I mean, you gave it to us. How could I not? You mentioned all of my weaknesses in the book, and I really tried to memorize it all! It's just... getting everything memorized isn't my forte...
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Yeah, I thought this would happen.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: As I've been trying to say, I'm not really as inflexible as you're making me out to be. Things aren't set in stone just because I'm in charge of this mission.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Here is the actual pre-operation handbook. It'll only take you a minute to remember everything.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I also considered the likelihood of us coming across apple trees and the fact that apples are currently in season, and set aside twenty minutes for us to pick apples.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I have a few gathering tools tucked away in my bag as well...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: N-Nice!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: That being the case, we still have to bring our mission to a successful conclusion. Is that understood?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Hehe, just what I wanted to hear! Wait till we're done making our desserts! We'll give you the biggest portion!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: I didn't mention anything about my penchant for desserts... Ahem, anyway, listen up for the next minute!
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Roger that!
attributes.name: Everyone

attributes.content: (Liskarm has actually given some thought to the things that everyone else on the team has in mind.)
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: (Here I was thinking I had to work with her and play the role of a steadfast Blacksteel mercenary. Was I overthinking it?)
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: (Franka even told me, 'When Liskarm's leading a team by herself, things are bound to run off the rails if there's even a single mischievous person on the team. You gotta stand on her side...')
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: (Whispers) Vanilla, is Captain Liskarm actually the type who likes a wily team?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: I thought she'd be so mad after we made that ruckus, but it looks like... she's not that mad... and she's not letting off sparks or anything?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: We heard Liskarm's just as unreasonable and cold as the rumors make her out to be, that she's a true professional who has absolutely no personal feelings.
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Well, I can vouch for her professionalism.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: And she also doesn't get mad even if you pretend to be difficult, although that doesn't mean she likes it either.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Liskarm is a professional who can tolerate even Franka's nonsensical personality.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: I don't really think any of you are unreasonable. I'm sure she feels the same way too.
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Did you guys... get pranked by someone maybe?
attributes.name: Vanilla

attributes.content: Ahaha... Well...
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: H-Hahaha, there's no way I would ever be bamboozled like that!
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: Wait, hold on. Now that you mention it, is it possible that she saw our whole putting on an act plan coming?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Wait a minute. Perhaps she did it on purpose, trying to get us to make a fool of ourselves.
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: I-It's not out of the question that they set us up together—
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: You could've at least waited till you were out of my earshot.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I can hear everything.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Sorry, Captain Liskarm—
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: (Whatever. This is probably all Franka's doing.)
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: (I guess... it's getting more and more difficult for me to act as strict as I used to back at Blacksteel.)
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: (It's just not easy to keep up that unsympathetic facade anymore now that I'm at Rhodes Island.)
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: (Sigh... if Franka finds out, she's definitely going to make fun of me for even trying to bluff.)
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: (If I wasn't with Rhodes Island now, I'm sure I'd have driven myself completely over the edge with how inflexible I used to be.)
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: (I've changed so much, and I didn't even notice until much later.)
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: (It was never a problem of good or bad.)
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: (But... I still have a ways to go.)
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: (If it wasn't for Rhodes Island, would 'non-Infected' like me ever truly understand the predicaments of the Infected? Would we even wish for everyone to be seen as equals?)
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: (It wasn't until I stopped being so cautious all the time that I finally noticed all the goodwill around me, small as they may be.)
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: (It was only then that I came to understand I still had the potential to take on an even greater cause and responsibility.)
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: (And now that I've understood that, there has to be even more areas where I can learn and improve.)
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: (I want to set my sights on something far more ambitious... Not like when I was still at Blacksteel, when all I wanted to do was to start a PMC that's 'just like Blacksteel.')
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: (For me, for my countrymen, and for all the Infected out there, I need to grow even more.)
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: (Right, I will definitely get there...)
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Captain Liskarm? Captain Liskarm!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Think you can open up that bag for us?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: The apples are about to come falling down—
attributes.name: Myrtle

attributes.content: What should I do with you girls...?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Hey, girls?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Apple picking isn't for another thirty minutes!
attributes.name: Liskarm
